name: The Liminal Space
description: "The Liminal Space" is a thrilling horror adventure game. Dive into surreal landscapes, solve intriguing puzzles, and evade terrifying creatures that inhabit the world. Beware, physical monsters lurk within the game. Make sure to stealthily avoid them as attracting their attention can land you in serious trouble! Your primary goal is to swiftly locate the exit and escape from this ghostly place unless you find this eerie environment enticing for living. So, are you prepared for the exciting and chilling challenges this game presents? Enter "The Liminal Space" now and explore the sheer thrill of the unexpected!
